VM that you deploy containers run entirely in user mode and share a kernel

the same runtime so you can be relatively assured that that portability is standard in addition to that the size

there's a lot of overhead containers are much lighter weight so that the size of
changes in the size of scale becomes a lot easier and a lot smaller to use and
then in addition to that when you start to employ concepts like orchestration

application consists of one container image or four or six or eight where are
